Sentencas: Hybrid power plants consisting of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) and a gas turbine (GT) can play an essential role in the future energy scenario due to the expected high electrical efficiency, fuel flexibility and good part-load performance.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant

Sentencas: A demonstration SOFC/GT hybrid power plant is being setup in Stuttgart with state of the art, commercially available electrolyte supported cell (ESC) stacks and its operation is being simulated by means of a overall system model.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant

Sentencas: However, the model used in this paper, in contrast to most models in literature, accounts for heat transfer based on actual geometries and materials.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant

Sentencas: In the present study, the system model is integrated with a set of sub-models that predict the heat losses of the components of the hybrid power plant with a feasible computational speed.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant

Sentencas: This allows for an improved prediction of the operating range as well as for the prevention of undesired operating conditions.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant

Sentencas: The results of the simulations of the stationary operation of the hybrid power plant with varying heat losses are shown and discussed.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant

Sentencas: Operating limitations are analyzed as well as system performance.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant

Sentencas: It is shown that it is possible to operate the hybrid power plant from design power output to 30% of it.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant

Sentencas: A system electrical efficiency higher than 0.55 considering the fuel's higher heating value is maintained throughout the entire range.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant

Sentencas: Further design choices and developments could lead to an improvement of this condition.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant

Sentencas: In addition, an adiabatic assumption can lead to about 4 percentage points overestimation of electrical efficiency and reduces the high power operating range by about 10%.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant

Sentencas: This approach opens up a new perspective on the simulation of this type of power plant.
Titulo: Analysis of the influence of heat transfer on the stationary operation and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid power plant
